name: Clin T
title: Clinical T
notes:
**Note 1:** TNM does not include an in situ category for thyroid gland tumors. Assign TX and behavior code /2 for in situ cases.

**Note 2:**  TNM considers all anaplastic carcinomas to be T4.

**Note 3:**  For the following descriptions, assign the appropriate T category based on the tumor size.

    Single invasive tumor confined to thyroid
    Extension into thyroid capsule, but not beyond
    Multiple foci confined to thyroid

    Minimal extrathyroid extension including:
    Strap muscle(s):
        Omohyoid
        Sternohyoid
        Sternothyroid
        Thyrohyoid

     Cricoid cartilage
     Esophagus
     Larynx
     Nerves:
        Recurrent laryngeal
        Vagus
    Parathyroid
    Pericapsular soft tissue/connective tissue
    Sternocleidomastoid muscle
    Trachea

    Localized, NOS

**Note 4:** Multifocal tumors of all histological types should be designated (m) (the largest determines the classification), e.g, T2(m). Record the information regarding the number of tumors in Site-Specific factor 1.
